document_data.mainbody:
rema Athkatla was a sweet custard, and one of the few desserts in Chultan cuisine. It was a remnant of the Amnian occupation of parts of Chult.
Crema Athkatla was caramel in color, and was served in bowls. One bowl was worth 5 silver pieces in Port Nyanzaru near the end of the 15 century DR.
